content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property and recognized a debt from a consumer credit agreement between the parties the applicant was awarded a vehicle worth eur 2700 while the defendant was awarded a vehicle worth eur 131250 the court also ordered the defendant to pay the applicant eur 69375 as compensation for the more expensive vehicle in terms of movable property the applicant received a television set pump washing machine and two hall cupboards while the defendant received a hall cupboard electric cooker freezer wardrobe sofa and corner sofa sectional the court discussed three articles from the civil code related to property the court also ordered the defendant to pay monthly child support for their minor children and to pay off the remaining balance on a consumer credit agreement the court considered the deteriorating relationship and the defendants infidelity as reasons for the dissolution of the marriage the court determined the obligations of the parties and the division of matrimonial property based on the evidence presented and the best interests of the minor children both parties were ordered to pay each other certain amounts for the costs of the proceedings and the defendant was also ordered to pay a stamp duty to the state budget

metadata.cost: 399.00 EUR (legal fees) + 81.00 EUR (stamp duty) to be borne by the defendant + 898.30 EUR (legal fees) + 3.52 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the applicant
